text: How do you go from being a post doc @CIRMnews  scholar to creating the company that developed a #COVID19 #vaccine? We talk to Dr. Derrick Rossi, co-founder of @moderna_tx about the vaccine, his career, and hopes for the future. #stemcells @StanfordMed https://t.co/H2sNcFg8x2 https://t.co/sTBTzPgP2w
